name: Farmingdale Aviation
about: Farmingdale Aviation, located at Republic Airport, offers comprehensive flight training tailored to all skill levels and budgets. With a diverse fleet of nine aircraft and FAA-approved Redbird FMX flight simulators, students receive professional instruction in both ground and flight environments. Our facility provides a convenient and supportive learning setting, allowing students to achieve their aviation goals. We invite prospective students to experience an introductory flight lesson or take a private tour of our facilities. Our commitment to quality education and safety ensures that students are well-prepared for their aviation careers. Join us to embark on your flight training journey with confidence and excellence.
services:

Ground School
